avg_numerator.__comment: Find number of bugs labelled regression
avg_numerator.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND labels=regression AND status NOT IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND updated > startOfDay(-90d)

avg_denominator.__comment: Find total number of bugs in a project
avg_denominator.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND status NOT IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND updated > startOfDay(-90d)
